item.title: Where does the loneliness go - Yumi Arai
item.description: ENGLISH You live in a country at the ends of the earth. Did you only come back Because you missed the peaceful winter scenery here? Did you only call me out of the blue, and tell me we should meet up To ask what had happened to all your old friends, too? I might act tough, but only I know You left on a journey then We embraced each other’s loneliness

item.title: Message in Rouge - Yumi Arai
item.description: ルージュの伝言 The song’s lyrics show a girl’s actions after finding out that her boyfriend cheated. What’s surprising is the fact that this girl is off on a journey to tell her boyfriend’s mother about the incident! (Yuming is the only one that can make these lyrics work.) ** ENGLISH I’m on a train by myself right now To meet his momma In the corner of my eye as twilight draws near,
